item.title: Hanes Sport Men’s XTemp Training Pants, Men’s Workout Pants With Pockets, Men’s Athletic Pants
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) You put in the sweat. Let Hanes® do the rest. Hanes Sport™ men’s activewear is designed to keep you fresher – no matter how long the workout. X-Temp™ performance training pants are engineered to adapt to your body temperature and activity level, keeping you comfortable. Cool Comfort™ fabric wicks away ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:53:57 UTC – Details)


You put in the sweat. Let Hanes® do the rest. Hanes Sport men’s activewear is designed to keep you fresher – no matter how long the workout. X-Temp performance training pants are engineered to adapt to your body temperature and activity level, keeping you comfortable. Cool Comfort fabric wicks away sweat while Cool DRI technology speeds drying. An elastic waistband and built-in quick cord adjust for the perfect fit. The result? You can focus on your training without the distraction of uncomfortable clothing. Featuring an open-bottom hem and convenient side pockets to stash your stuff, these pants are ready to work – or not – just as hard as you are.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13 x 8 x 1 inches; 5.6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ O5A08
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 6, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hanes Men’s Athletic Child Code
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01L9H8J46

Imported
Machine Wash
HANES SPORT – Performance. Style. Comfort. Hanes Sport apparel builds on our comfort heritage with innovative technologies to give you the looks that fit your life, your sport, and your style.
STAY COOL – XTemp technology is engineered to adapt to your activity level and body temperature, keeping you cooler and drier all day.
MOISTURE-WICKING PANTS – Cool Comfort fabric wicks sweat away to help you stay cooler.
FAST DRYING – This men’s activewear features Cool DRI technology that dries fabric faster so you stay more comfortable.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL – Constructed using premium polyester and cotton mechanical stretch Taclite ripstop fabric with a triple-stitching built, this pair of pants is sturdy and flexible to ensure maximum performance in the field.TEFLON-TREATED FABRIC – Coated with Teflon, these pants have a protective finish that resists stain, soil, and moisture ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $46.40
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:19:56 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL – Constructed using premium polyester and cotton mechanical stretch Taclite ripstop fabric with a triple-stitching built, this pair of pants is sturdy and flexible to ensure maximum performance in the field.
TEFLON-TREATED FABRIC – Coated with Teflon, these pants have a protective finish that resists stain, soil, and moisture without compromising breathability. The coating also makes it easier to clean this garment!
FULLY GUSSETED CONSTRUCTION – Featuring a gusseted inseam and a fitted appearance, this pair of pants offers optimum flexibility and a comfortable fit to eliminate your worries about rips and tears.
SPECIALIZED POCKETS – Specially designed for professionals on the go, this pair of pants has 8 pockets including strap-and-slash seat pockets to provide ample storage and easy access to all your mission-critical gear.
TRUSTED BRAND – Developed with quality in mind, 5.11 Tactical offers a wide range of products that includes shirts, pants, bags, accessories, and more. Defining their brand through challenge and fortitude, 5.11 promises readiness beyond limits.

From the brand

File Set

This set include 16 pieces files made by T12 Drop Forged Alloy Steel.A great file set for you to do woodworking

Tool Bag

This 16 inch tool bag is constructed with a durable fabric and include 169 pieces household essential tool.

Tool Set

quality tools – Equipped with household essential tool sets that are made out of high-quality steel and are finished in chrome to ensure durability strength, Perfect for home repair and DIY projects
Large tool bag – 16 inch tool bag is designed for carrying small to medium-sized hand tools and other small accessories. It is constructed with a durable fabric so it can withstand the load of your tools. The bag features a wide opening design for you to easily store, organize and take out your tools
More space – 11 interior pockets and 8 exterior pockets will provide you enough storage space for tool organizing. The large open space provides you instant access to your tools as well as visibility to the tool you want to use. The tool bag is easy and comfortable to travel with as it has a padded shoulder strap and a comfortable handle that has a fine grip
Perfect gift choice – With REXBETI tool kit, you will enjoy a complete variety of tools which you can use for any of your DIY projects
About REXBETI – REXBETI tool bag, a great tool set for men to do home work

A quality tool bag is essential for staying organized and efficient whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. REXBETI tool bag is designed for carrying small to medium-sized hand tools and other small accessories. It is constructed with a durable fabric so it can withstand the load of your tools. The bag features a wide opening design for you to easily store, organize and take out your tools. On the bottom of the bag, there’s 5 base pads to maintains its sturdiness and to protect bottom from wet and dirty conditions. Even when accidental and hard drops occur, the rubbery foam bottom will protects your tools and will remain in their places. The bag also features an internal metal frame that maintains the structure of the bag so you can put and get your tools in and from the bag without losting its shape.

Beside the bag, this REXBETI tool bag is equipped with 219 pieces home repair tools. Most of the tools are made out of high-quality steel and are finished in chrome to ensure durability strength and for the tools to have an anti-corrosion protection.

This set includes:

1pc tool bag / 1pc 8oz claw hammer / 1pc magnetic level / 1pc 16ft tape measure / 1pc utility knife with 10pc blades

2pc Spring clamps / 8pc SAE hex key set: 1/16-5/64-3/32-1/8-3/16-7/32-1/4″ / 8pc Metric hex key set: 1.5-2-2.5-3-4-5-5.5-6mm / 1pc mini saw

1pc water pump plier / 1pc adjustable wrench / 1pc long nose plier / 1pc diagonal plier / 20pc Cr-V bits / 1pc holder / 4pc precision screwdriver

1pc voltage tester / 3pc Cr-V wrench / 30pc 150mm black cable ties / 120pc hardware / 1pc 5 meter electrical tape / 1pc LED flashlight

Large tool bag

The first thing you will notice in this bag is the number of compartments it has. Except the 11 interior pockets, there’re also 8 exterior pockets where you can store often used small tools and accessories so you can instantly reach them

Read more

High quality tool set

Padded strp & handle

The adjustable strap to provide you an easy and quick access to your tools and also a big helper if you have to move around with your tools.

Wide opening mouth

Large-compartment providing ample space for a wide vatiety of tools, parts and accessories. The large open space provides you instant access to your tools as well as visibility to the tool you want to use

Base pads design

5 base pads to maintains its sturdiness and to protect bottom from wet and dirty conditions

Read more

6″ diagonal plier

Pleated Athletic Skirt ► This high waisted skorts activewear womens designed pleated hem at the back,the flowing looks make you more fashion during workout. Cheer mini skirt help you enjoy the beauty while exercising.
With 3 Pockets ► 3 pockets in this golf skirt with shorts can play different roles.Pockets on the leg to fit tennis balls and also secure to store essentials like phone,card etc… Another back waistband zipper pocket convenience for you to hold keys, coins and other necessary.
Built-in Short Liner ► Our women athletic tennis skirt skort has two layers, skirt outer and shorts inner, the inner short can provide you with extra coverage, enhances your range of motion, not see through when you’ve been sweating on the court.
Wide Elastic Waistband ► The sports pleated skirts with shorts is elastic and comfortable to wear, which can hide stomach mildly and stay in place, not roll down when you do sport. Provides a comfortable natural fit with plenty of coverage while bending and stretching.

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08C29X77C

Machine Wash
BOOST PERFORMANCE: We use soft fabric to bring you sports shorts for men that offer just the right balance of softness, breathability, and stretchiness to keep you comfortable throughout your workouts
10-INCH INSEAM: Whether you’re working out at the gym or running on the track, our men’s gym shorts have you covered. They are suitable for all your sports and workout activities including gym, cycling, running, basketball, football, tennis and more
POCKETS ON BOTH SIDES: Thanks to the hand pockets, you can easily carry your wallet, smartphone, and other small accessories when working out or traveling. These mens athletic shorts can be paired up with other clothing to create your own look
BREATHABLE & QUICK DRYING: Our breathable sports shorts for men wick moisture away from the skin while being gentle and quick-drying so you can workout, train and push your limits while staying comfortable and feeling dry
GET THE RIGHT FIT: Our men’s workout shorts feature an encased elastic waistband which coupled with the inner drawcord makes sure you get the perfect fit every time. Our shorts stay comfortably in place whether running or training without sliding up or down








Long Sleeve Tee Shirts for Men Moisture Wicking Quick Dry
Moisture Wicking Golf Shirt Quick Dry Golf Polos for Men
Athletic Women’s Gym Performance T Shirts Workout Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Women
Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Men Athletic T Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Athletic Men’s Gym T Shirts
Material Polyester Polyester and Spandex Polyester Polyester Polyester Polyester
Size Option S-3XL S-3XL S-2XL S-2XL S-3XL S-3XL

Support Your Performance While Staying Comfortable With Men’s Activewear Shorts

Whether you’re working out or just playing sports, you need clothes that can keep up with your active lifestyle. This is why we designed our athletic shorts for men to provide you with a simple and fashion-forward way to stay comfortable and dry throughout the day to help you take your performance to the next level.

We made our moisture-wicking running shorts to make your daily workout routine easier and comfier. This is why we use carefully chosen materials that offer just the right balance between breathability and comfort with a fashion-forward yet simple design so you can slip these workout shorts on and head out knowing you’ll look just as good as you feel.

The Perfect Fit

These shorts have an adjustable drawstring and elastic closure that make sure they stay firmly and comfortably in place all day. You can easily adjust the tightness for a custom fit that’s not too tight or loose so you can move around and stretch without worry.

Side Pockets

Our mens gym shorts are designed with 2 side pockets that provide you with all the storage space you need to keep your keys, wallet, smartphones, and other accessories safe and within arm’s reach whether at home or on the go.

Easy To Maintain

The men’s athletic shorts are machine washable and quick-drying to take the hassle out of keeping them clean. Simply machine wash with cold water without using bleach or fabric softener and tumble dry on low – that’s it.

Read more

Made For Daily Use

Besides being perfect for sports and workouts, our breathable shorts for men with pockets are suitable to wear even when lounging around your home, on the go, parties and any other occasion you have in mind making them ideal for daily wear.

Read more

Enjoy A Better Workout Experience

No athletic wardrobe is complete without a comfortable pair of workout shorts. We designed our quick-drying sports shorts to provide just the right fit for any activity you have in mind to give you the support you need to keep pushing your limits.

Our men’s athletic shorts are made for people that don’t want to settle. They wick away moisture from the skin to stay cool and dry throughout the day which coupled with their lightweight and comfortable feel make them perfect for workouts, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, badminton, boxing, cycling, running, hiking, and much more.

BOOST PERFORMANCE: We use soft fabric to bring you sports shorts for men that offer just the right balance of softness, breathability, and stretchiness to keep you comfortable throughout your workouts
10-INCH INSEAM: Whether you’re working out at the gym or running on the track, our men’s gym shorts have you covered. They are suitable for all your sports and workout activities including gym, cycling, running, basketball, football, tennis and more
POCKETS ON BOTH SIDES: Thanks to the hand pockets, you can easily carry your wallet, smartphone, and other small accessories when working out or traveling. These mens athletic shorts can be paired up with other clothing to create your own look

Support Your Performance While Staying Comfortable With Men’s Activewear Shorts

Whether you’re working out or just playing sports, you need clothes that can keep up with your active lifestyle. This is why we designed our athletic shorts for men to provide you with a simple and fashion-forward way to stay comfortable and dry throughout the day to help you take your performance to the next level.

We made our moisture-wicking running shorts to make your daily workout routine easier and comfier. This is why we use carefully chosen materials that offer just the right balance between breathability and comfort with a fashion-forward yet simple design so you can slip these workout shorts on and head out knowing you’ll look just as good as you feel.

The Perfect Fit

These shorts have an adjustable drawstring and elastic closure that make sure they stay firmly and comfortably in place all day. You can easily adjust the tightness for a custom fit that’s not too tight or loose so you can move around and stretch without worry.

Side Pockets

Our mens gym shorts are designed with 2 side pockets that provide you with all the storage space you need to keep your keys, wallet, smartphones, and other accessories safe and within arm’s reach whether at home or on the go.

Easy To Maintain

The men’s athletic shorts are machine washable and quick-drying to take the hassle out of keeping them clean. Simply machine wash with cold water without using bleach or fabric softener and tumble dry on low – that’s it.

Read more

Made For Daily Use

Besides being perfect for sports and workouts, our breathable shorts for men with pockets are suitable to wear even when lounging around your home, on the go, parties and any other occasion you have in mind making them ideal for daily wear.

Read more

Enjoy A Better Workout Experience

No athletic wardrobe is complete without a comfortable pair of workout shorts. We designed our quick-drying sports shorts to provide just the right fit for any activity you have in mind to give you the support you need to keep pushing your limits.

Our men’s athletic shorts are made for people that don’t want to settle. They wick away moisture from the skin to stay cool and dry throughout the day which coupled with their lightweight and comfortable feel make them perfect for workouts, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, badminton, boxing, cycling, running, hiking, and much more.
